summary: Update Trade Logger UX: remove the popup modal and render the same Trade Logger UI inline within the Trades (Trade Journal) page for a seamless experience, opening via Log Trade actions similar to the Create Model flow.
architectural_notes: Trade Logger should open inline within the Trades (Trade Journal) page (not as a tab and not as a modal), using a flow similar to Create Model; modal version is removed.

existing_features.title: Remove the Trade Logger modal behavior and render the Trade Logger (trade creation/edit) UI inline within the Trades (Trade Journal) page instead of inside a popup dialog.

Change the Trade Logger open/close flow on the Trades page to behave like an inline 'Create Model' style experience: clicking "Log Trade" (and the Live Setup Identifier's "Log Trade" action) should reveal the inline Trade Logger section within the Trades page (not a new tab and not a modal), and closing should return the user to the normal Trade Journal list view.
Keep the Trade Logger UI layout and fields practically the same as the current modal version while converting it to inline rendering (i.e., reuse the same form sections, inputs, and interactions).

Update any Trade Logger-specific layout/styling that was tied to a Radix Dialog (e.g., dialog content sizing/overflow rules) so the inline Trade Logger remains full-width, vertically stacked, and overflow-safe when rendered inside the Trades page container.

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace Trade Logger popup modal with an inline Trade Logger view embedded in the Trades (Trade Journal) page; open from Log Trade (and Live Setup identifier Log Trade) similar to the Create Model flow, keeping the UI/fields the same and removing the modal entirely.

projectName: Replace Trade Logger modal with inline Trade Logger on Trade Journal page
